thread.title: Ice hockey brings North and South Korea together

title: Ice hockey brings North and South Korea together
text:
Ice hockey brings North and South Korea together 6:06am EST - 00:55 
The two Koreas will field a combined women's ice hockey team and march together under one flag at next month's Winter Olympics in the South, Seoul said on Wednesday, after a new round of talks amid a thaw in cross-border ties ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
